meanings.definition: Containing the most faults or defects.
meanings.sent1: The faultiest car in the lot had dents and scratches all over.
meanings.sent2: Out of all the options, the faultiest one was the broken toy.
meanings.sent3: The faultiest umbrella I owned couldn't even keep me dry in a light drizzle.
meanings.sent4: Her excuse for being late was the faultiest bridge I've ever heard.
meanings.sent5: The faultiest piece of furniture in the house was the wobbly table.

meanings.definition: Having the most errors or mistakes.
meanings.sent1: The faultiest math homework had multiple incorrect answers.
meanings.sent2: Among all the reports, his was the faultiest with numerous typos.
meanings.sent3: The faultiest recipe I tried resulted in a burnt cake.
meanings.sent4: His plan was the faultiest ladder to success anyone had ever seen.
meanings.sent5: The faultiest map led us in circles for hours.
